about_the_game:
Fadeout: Underground is a Third Person shooter in the vein of classic PC games from the late 90s and early 2000s. Inspired by games like Quake, Unreal Tournament, and Team Fortress with some unique twists.

Fast-Paced Combat

Each playable character features unique combat traits that never force you into playing a specific role.
Pick up weapons & gadgets on the map to augment your play style.
Fight in online multiplayer with several classic game-modes including; Death Match, Team Death Match, Capture the Flag, Arena, Team Arena, & Conquest!

Features

5 Maps
6 Gamemodes
+1 Bonus Mutation Mode (Randomizer)
22 Weapons
8 Playable characters
detailed_description:
Just Updated

Game is feature complete and has exited Early Access! - If you want to find players, join our community on Discord!


About the Game

Fadeout: Underground is a Third Person shooter in the vein of classic PC games from the late 90s and early 2000s. Inspired by games like Quake, Unreal Tournament, and Team Fortress with some unique twists.

Fast-Paced Combat

Each playable character features unique combat traits that never force you into playing a specific role.
Pick up weapons & gadgets on the map to augment your play style.
Fight in online multiplayer with several classic game-modes including; Death Match, Team Death Match, Capture the Flag, Arena, Team Arena, & Conquest!

Features

5 Maps
6 Gamemodes
+1 Bonus Mutation Mode (Randomizer)
22 Weapons
8 Playable characters
legal_notice: All art assets, design, and music in the game has been paid for or created by Weston Mitchell for use in Fadeout: Underground and nothing else. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel i5 6th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 870 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Nvidia GTX 980 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or Higher
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Fadeout: Underground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 870 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th gen or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Fadeout: Underground is a classic-style Third-Person online multiplayer shooter.
